Date: Monday, 5/1/1990
Subject: Status of Francisco Melendez
Dear Sir,
Francisco Melendez shouldn't play at AA Erie Sea Wolves!
He has an AVG of .245 over there, that might
be a sign that he has been promoted to soon. You
should demote him before he gets burned.

Regards,
Scouting Director
